Credentials
===========

The credential files for ERA-I, MERRA2, JRA55 are usually stored under the directory on PC or userâ€™s home directory on virtual machine (~/home/<username>). It is necessary to configure the directory containing credential files in the download parameter file (e.g. examples.globsim_download).

-.ecmwfapirc (ERA_Intrerim credential)
-.merrarc (MERRA2 credentials)
-.jra55rc (JRA-55 credentials)
